summary.p: Returns the exponential value of the specified float expression, that is e raised to the specified power.

returns.p: The number e raised to the power value. If value equals NaN or PositiveInfinity, that value is returned. If value equals NegativeInfinity, 0 is returned.

remarks.p: Use the POWER function to calculate powers of other bases.
EXP is the inverse of LOG.
